channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed

item.title: Trump vows to build U.S. bitcoin reserve. Crypto community is cheering.
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump on Saturday said he would ‚Äúimmediately‚Äù appoint a bitcoin and crypto presidential advisory council upon taking office, if he wins the U.S. presidential election in November.

item.title: Sales of $100 million homes set to double this year as trophy properties recover
item.description: The comeback marks a stark contrast with the national housing market, which is still feeling the pressure of high mortgage rates and lack of supply.

item.description: The PCE price index was expected to increase 0.1% in June and 2.5% from a year ago.

item.title: At least 30 dead in Gaza school airstrike; Israel says targeted militants
item.description: The Hamas-run government media office said 15 children and eight women were among those killed in the strike in the central town of Deir Al-Balah.

item.title: Dexcom shares plunge more than 40% for worst day on record
item.description: Dexcom, which had its stock market debut in 2005, had its worst day ever after lowering its full-year guidance.

item.title: Blinken chides Beijing's 'escalating actions' at sea, concerned over Taiwan
item.description: Blinken singled out China over its coast guard's hostile actions against U.S. defense treaty ally the Philippines in the South China Sea.

item.title: ‚ÄòWe let our lawyers duke it out‚Äô: My $300K brokerage account was accidentally omitted from my divorce. Should I say something?

item.title: Apple and Microsoft are among the 'Magnificent Seven' stocks set to report next week. Here's what that means
item.description: Wall Street could be in for a volatile bout of trading next week if this one was anything to go by.

item.title: Trump proposes strategic national crypto stockpile: 'Never sell your bitcoin'
item.description: Donald Trump headlined Bitcoin 2024, his latest move in a months-long campaign to appeal to the crypto contingent.

item.title: Trump running mate JD Vance doubles down on 'childless cat ladies' comment about Harris, Democrats
item.description: Donald Trump's GOP running mate Sen. JD Vance has been under fire for criticizing Democrats like Vice President Kamala Harris for not having children.

item.title: Going for gold ‚Äî Three 'Big Short' traders say the precious metal is a major long
item.description: "The Big Short" traders Danny Moses, Vincent Daniel and Porter Collins, known for successfully betting against the housing market, find gold very attractive.
